tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mohak has the wonderful ability to put a patient at ease and complete even the most complicated procedures without much fuss. My experience with him was brilliant.

tags: None
review: I had visited the doctor earlier also for myself and others and this time also for my younger son. Each time the doctor has done his best by trying to explain the issues and remedies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mohak was really good in terms understanding my needs and made me feel really comfortable and explained the process really well. I am very satisfied with my treatment and would highly 
recommend the doctor to anyone looking for implants,dentures etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Fantastic doctor! Dedicated to his profession. Explained every bit of the procedure and treatments. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mohak is patient friendly, explains the issues, discusses the plan of treatment on the day of visit as well as next follow up plan and advices routine care and maintenance with minimal medicines.
He is punctual, has a good practice of follow up call from his office on the day of the visit and goes extra mile to wait on watch before suggesting any surgical intervention.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Anybody who visits a doctor certainly expresses his/her matter of concern, but what makes it important for the patient is to know about the real cause and factors that led to the problem. For me the doctor helped me in identifying the issues, steps to follow and being optimistic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am extremely happy with Dr. Mohak Ruparel as his patient...He has extremely gentle hands while treating the patient which I am very happy about. I feel very secure with him as a patient..I will definitely go back to him in future too. Also I would like to recommend  him to my family and friends..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dr came home to check out my elderly father who's on wheelchair and couldn't go to clinic. He thoroughly checked my dad's teeth and prescribed a maintenance schedule for it. He was patient, kind, efficient and thorough 
He also asked me to inform him later in case dad got pain again , even at a late hour. I was very impressed with his treatment.

tags: None
review:
- Very warm
- Explains the problem well
- Is sensitive to the patient's comfort with specific type of medicines
- Is very patient and does not rush through

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,GIC Tooth Fillings,
review: I was recommended by a very close friend of mine to visit Dr Mohak Ruparel for my tooth problem . I went to him with faith and trust .He is an excellent Doctor, very patient ,humble , polite and knows his work . He makes the patient very comfortable and explains the the whole procedure he is going to follow after checking you . That is what I liked about him and does not force or scare the patient at all. He is very patient and listens to all the queries the patient has and answers them one by one. I am very glad that we have a excellent Dentist in our area where I stay who is extremely good . I would recommend him to all my near and dear ones to go to him. God bless him for his Good work.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Dr. Mohak Ruparel explained to me my dental problem and gave me good suggestion for the bridge.   I am happy with the bridge work he did for me.   When I had pain and some problems much after extraction he was accessible and was concerned and he advised me properly.  He is a friendly person.   I would highly recommend him to my friends.   I wish him success in his life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Love the way Dr. Ruparel explains every step of the procedure and his want to save the original tooth instead of choosing an easy way of putting an implant is what really impressed us. Hats off to the effort! Putting the patients comfort as priority is something you will always experience with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Mohak Ruparel is nice in all angle, he explain you very diply about your problem & give u all suggestions with which one is better,I have problem of cyst below teeth, other doctor suggested me to remove teeth, but doctor Ruparel give me nice (RCT)treatment with little surgery to save my teeth & remove cyst, now i feel better with my original teeth thanks to Dr. Mohak Ruparel.
